org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.tx
Class AeTxManagerXMLDBConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.tx.AeTxManagerXMLDBConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeXMLDBConnection
public class AeTxManagerXMLDBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeXMLDBConnection

A delegate version of a xmldb local tx connection where the close, commit and rollback methods are ignored. The connection is really closed on commit or rollback operations initiated by the TransactionManager.

public java.lang.Object getNativeConnection()
